message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair to me!
Let's be real, Alice. I make the proposals in even rounds. Take the hit now, and we can both come out ahead.
I'm willing to negotiate, Bob.  Let's split the difference from your last offer.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's make a deal!
Okay, Alice, you drive a hard bargain. Let's split the difference again and call it a deal.  This way we both walk away with something substantial.
